about.description: Hello, I'm Andr√©, I'm 19 years old and I graduated from COTEMIG technical high school, where I took the Web and Mobile development course. I'm currently in the 3rd period of the Systems Analysis and Development course at COTEMIG College. I develop websites and iOS applications with modern and high-quality interfaces, focused on performance, animations, responsiveness, and SEO.
